mdRecord.dcterms:title: The county of Rockbridge Virginia / prepared by John Carmichael
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: A. Hoen & Co.
Campbell, J. L. (John Lyle), 1818-1886
Carmichael, John fl. 1883
Gilham, William, 1819?-1872
Hotchkiss, Jedediah, 1828-1899
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 72 x 87 cm. on sheet 76 x 91 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Oriented with north to the left.
Map shows names of landowners, local railroads, landowners names, iron ore deposits.

Text following title: "Note: He has used as a basis the map of Col. William Gilham V. M. I. 1859: and that of Maj. Jed Hotchkiss and Rail Road and private surveys. Information as to mineral development by Prof. John L. Campbell of Washington & Lee University. December, 1883."
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Imperfect: Fragile, separated at center fold; browned; linen-backed.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Real property--Virginia--Rockbridge County.
Mines and mineral resources--Virginia--Rockbridge County--Maps.
Rockbridge County (Va.)--Maps.
